pkgmetadata.longdescription: Erscipcard=========Quick start-----------1.Add "ersciyt" to your INSTALLED_APPS in your project setting.py file:```INSTALLED_APPS = [...,'ersciyt',]```2.Include the erscipcard URLconf in your project urls.py like this:```path('yt/', include('ersciyt.urls')),```3.Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/yt/ to create users and its cards.4.run this command if you on shell.cloud.google:```python>>>from ersciyt import inst>>>inst.run()```
